content: bamboo bloom thick n thin cowl universal yarn bamboo bloom or universal yarn bamboo bloom handpaints 154 yds u s #10 5 6 5 mm 16 circular needles 1 stitch marker skill level easy pattern loosely cast on 80 stitches using a long tail cast on or use your favorite stretchy cast on join stitches in the round and place a beginning of round stitch marker being careful not to twist the stitches round 1 purl all other rounds knit when the yarn is thin and purl when the yarn is thick continue in this pattern until you have 6 yards remaining last round purl bind-off loosely in purl this pattern is for personal use only not for resale ©2025 unwind yarn shop llc all rights reserved 9912 e grand river brighton mi 810-229-5579 www unwindyarnshopmi com 1
